title: High adsorption to methylene blue based on Fe3O4–N-banana-peel biomass charcoal
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25619-25628
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04973J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhu-Xiang Gong, Mfitumucunguzi Steven, Yan-Ting Chen, Li-Zhu Huo, Hao Xu, Chao-Fei Guo, Xue-Juan Yang, Yu-Xuan Wang, Xi-Ping Luo
This research focused on utilizing banana peel as the primary material for producing mesoporous biomass charcoal through one-step potassium hydroxide activation.
